name: Infimetrics
description: Infimetrics is a global provider of IT consulting and development services helping customers to achieve the business goals and improve performance with a range of services which includes Digital transformation, IT Consulting services, IT Managed Services, Product Engineering services. We help organizations to increase scalability and optimize business processes with the help of information technology so that they are always ahead of the competition. Infimetrics take pride in delivering solutions to clients in Europe, Australia, USA, India and has ever-growing capabilities in Enterprise Mobility, Data analysis, AI/ML, Enterprise Cloud, etc
features: Powering the enterprise to the future, staying relevant and modern.
Enhance customer experience with digital transformation.
Accelerate business with next-gen AI and ML technology.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
sub_categories: Software and Services Related to HR Software
Headline: Partner in creating and delivering value.
ShortDescription: Infimetrics is a global provider of IT consulting and development services helping customers to achieve the business goals and improve performance with a range of services which includes Digital transformation, IT Consulting services, IT Managed Services, Product Engineering services.

Highlights.name: DIGITAL TRANSFORMATION
Highlights.description: With the power of digital transformation. Infimetrics helps transform businesses by adopting digital technologies.

Highlights.name: COGNITIVE COMPUTING
Highlights.description: Unleash the power of Artificial Intelligence to drive growth analysing trends and predicting results.

Highlights.name: PROCESS DIGITIZATION
Highlights.description: Transforming an organization using technology to optimise the process and automating the business workflow.

enhanced_description: Infimetrics is a global provider of comprehensive IT consulting and development services, established in 2017. Their offerings span Digital Transformation, IT Consulting, IT Managed Services, and Product Engineering, aimed at helping organizations achieve business goals, improve performance, increase scalability, and optimize business processes. They leverage advanced capabilities in Enterprise Mobility, Data analysis, AI/ML, and Enterprise Cloud to provide next-gen solutions. While offering broad IT services, Infimetrics specifically targets HR-related objectives such as boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity, and accelerating top talent acquisition. They support HR functions including Talent Management, Recruiting, Total Rewards, Employee Scheduling, Time Tracking, Payroll, and Staffing. Infimetrics primarily serves Large and Global Enterprises across Europe, Australia, USA, and India.
key_use_cases: Enhancing customer experience with digital transformation
Accelerating business with next-gen AI and ML technology
Driving growth through AI-powered trend analysis and prediction
Boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity
Hiring top talent faster and more efficiently
competitive_advantages: Global presence with client delivery in Europe, Australia, USA, India
Expertise in next-gen AI and ML technology
Proven capabilities in Enterprise Mobility, Data analysis, and Enterprise Cloud
Specialization in Digital Transformation and Process Digitization
Focus on increasing scalability and optimizing business processes
scalability_features: Focus on increasing organizational scalability through IT consulting and development services
